title: Parkour Warrior Fanmade Map (MCCS10) (Fanmade Remake)
briefDescription: With Noxcrew's MC Championship on the rise, did you ever wanna play the Parkour Map, but don't have a PC or Laptop to play on? ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
With Noxcrew?s MC Championship on the rise, did you ever wanna play the Parkour Map, but don?t have a PC or Laptop to play on? Well, not anymore! Here?s MCC Season 10?s Parkour Warrior Map for Bedrock Edition!
Note:
This is NOT TAKEN from Noxcrew?s Website. Infact, there is NO official map that Noxcrew has made for the public audience. All recreations of the Parkour Course from public map websites are fanmade and are NOT 100% accurate or endorsed by Noxcrew, and yes, this includes this map.
All courses of this map has been gathered from VODs and Highlights from streamers that play the tournament, therefore is a fanmade recreation, and not a one-to-one replica.
Another Side Note:
The GUI Texture Pack will be linked within the Video Description (I can?t give out the Bare Bones Texture Pack b/c it?s not mine. Please download it manually here: https://mcpedl.com/bare-bones-be/)
Here?s a quick video of what to expect!
There are timer options!
Here?s a showcase of the Map!

title: Therealechonox?s Puzzle Map No. 3
briefDescription: This is the third map in my little series. In this one you are in space or on a different planet or something, inside a ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is the third map in my little series. In this one you are in space or on a different planet or something, inside a space station of sorts. Your final goal is to turn on the reactor. But watch out! Some parts of the station are covered in this weird material called ?C9tamination!? You will need to find a Bio-suit to enter these areas. This map has been tested and is completely functional. Finally, you may not be alone in this space station?

title: Room Escape
briefDescription: What would you do if you were locked in a room... And your only memory was that you needed to escape! This map is inspired ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
What would you do if you were locked in a room? And your only memory was that you needed to escape! This map is inspired by the point-and-click adventure games. In this map, you are investigating the past of Charles Reolosus. Upon entering his old factory, you realise that you are locked in and you need to escape. Read the various journals scattered about to learn more about the predicament you are now in.
***IMPORTANT*** Be sure to only rename papers, or else this map will most certainly break!

title: My Redstone Smart House? V2 [Redstone]
briefDescription: An improvement to the fan favourite My Redstone Smart House I introduce to you... My Redstone Smart House V2!! Achievements edition, bigger, better, improved, and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
An improvement to the fan favourite My Redstone Smart House I introduce to you? My Redstone Smart House V2!! Achievements edition, bigger, better, improved, and now in survival! Filled with many new contraptions, and a new nether, this Smart Mansion is ready and waiting for you and all the adventures you will go on!
This map features a big mansion which is suitable for all kinds of adventures where you need somewhere safe to stay. There is one master bedroom (with 8 beds combined) and lots of different redstone mechanisms which will greatly improve your standards of living. Outside you will also find multiple different types of automatic farms. You could literally stay within the boundaries of your property and still survive for a long time. Creator: DireWolf314159

sometimes you will be surprised of the button?s hidden places.
There are some simple levels and there are some messy and difficult levels.

title: Bedrock Pumpkin and Melon Farm (Auto AFK)
briefDescription: Hi again, as i previously made an item sorting system for this awesome platform, i had a suggestion to make a few farms etc. So ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Hi again, as i previously made an item sorting system for this awesome platform, i had a suggestion to make a few farms etc. So i had a play around and was happy with the result of a pretty fast auto afk pumpkin and melon farm. I also added an option i rather liked, a double hopper system for double the loading speed! One is just boring! Well its more than that, it actually has eight modules and a built in storage system for top layers and instant access to bottom layers! Enjoy and please let me know of any more suggestions. Iron farm coming soon.

If there?s anything that could be improved in this map, put it down in your comments.

title: Sumo Masters
briefDescription: Download this map, invite friends, give everyone some snowballs, and become a SUMO MASTER. Features four (4) sumo arenas, settings for the time of day and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Download this map, invite friends, give everyone some snowballs, and become a SUMO MASTER.
Features four (4) sumo arenas, settings for the time of day and weather, and even a snowball button.
After seeing the success of my first minigame map (TNT Run), I decided to follow up with another, even better minigame. Enter, Sumo Masters.
Sumo Masters is worth the 30 seconds it takes to download it; featuring polished gameplay and settings, toggles for the environment, a beautiful map, and multiple arenas.
?Sumo? is a classic Minecraft party game, in which players try to knock the others off of a small platform. The arenas in this map are built small on purpose; specially designed for quick, fun games with a few of your best friends. I don?t recommend more than 4 players/match.
Here?s some images of the map.
The arenas:
Spawn and other images:

title: PVP Duels
briefDescription: Want to have a 1v1 match with your friends? You've come to the right place. This map is a 1v1 PVP map with 4 different modes, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Want to have a 1v1 match with your friends? You?ve come to the right place. This map is a 1v1 PVP map with 4 different modes, to keep you from being bored. This project has automatic winner detection among other new features.
Lobby

You will see two entrances. To start a fight, one player stand on one entrance pressure plate and the other stand on the other entrance pressure plate.
Duel types avaliable
There are four modes
? NoDebuff
Classic PVP with ender pearls and lots of healing potions.
? Gapple
Classic PVP but with enchanted apples. You only get 16 of them because enchanted apples are too overpowered.
? BuildUHC
Possibly the first type of PVP ever invented. The classic fight experience becomes asymmetrical with building, buckets, bows and fishing rods.
? BowPVP
You are only allowed to use the bow to fight. You are allowed to build defense structures with the blocks given, though.
For the BuildUHC and BowPVP modes, blocks are given. This map shows where you are allowed to place them. (These markings are not in the real map.)
You can choose the type of duel to be done through this panel in the lobby.
The off-limits area. (Look at the amount of commands!)

title: The Fortress
briefDescription: Set in an alternate reality where the End, Nether, and Overworld have collided, a massive fortress has been built to protect the survivors.You are ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Set in an alternate reality where the End, Nether, and Overworld have collided, a massive fortress has been built to protect the survivors.
You are the Overworld?s last hope
(This is a work in progress.)
You are the last known human survivor of an apocalypse in which the Overworld, Nether, and End collided, creating an extraordinarily dangerous landscape. Luckily for you, a massive Fortress had been built, giving you a safe-haven in the uncertain apocalyptic world.

The Fortress?s walls are lined with obsidian, to protect from the ghasts, creepers, and other monsters which haunt the once (relatively) peaceful Overworld. Because the Fortress was originally built with the intention of containing an entire town, there is plenty of storage space for anything. Unfortunately, not much was placed into storage before the devastating collision, so you will have to brave the harsh environment to collect many items necessary for your survival. However, food and water are not an issue, as an entire farm has been built inside the facility, along with a well. Additionally, once you bring an item safely back to the Fortress once, you can use the in-house cloner to replicate it in the future.
